mapper.select: SELECT t.*,t1.* FROM (SELECT iicr.id,iicr.bid,iicr.remark,iicr.report_period,iicr.company_code,iicr.company_name,CONVERT(iicr.first_year_rate,DECIMAL(18,2)) first_year_rate, CONVERT(iicr.second_year_rate,DECIMAL(18,2)) second_year_rate,CONVERT(iicr.third_year_rate,DECIMAL(18,2)) third_year_rate,iicrd.id e_id,iicrd.bid e_bid,iicrd.company_code e_company_code, iicrd.company_name e_company_name,CONVERT(iicrd.first_year_rate,DECIMAL(18,2)) e_first_year_rate,CONVERT(iicrd.second_year_rate,DECIMAL(18,2)) e_second_year_rate, CONVERT(iicrd.third_year_rate,DECIMAL(18,2)) e_third_year_rate FROM ipo_industry_compare_rate iicr LEFT JOIN ipo_industry_compare_rate_detail iicrd ON iicr.id = iicrd.bid WHERE iicr.bid = #{bid}) t, (SELECT iicrd.bid,CONVERT(AVG(iicrd.first_year_rate),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS firstAvg,CONVERT(AVG(iicrd.second_year_rate),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS secondAvg,CONVERT(AVG(iicrd.third_year_rate),DECIMAL(18,2)) AS thirdAvg FROM ipo_industry_compare_rate iicr LEFT JOIN ipo_industry_compare_rate_detail iicrd ON iicr.id = iicrd.bid WHERE iicr.bid = #{bid} GROUP BY iicrd.bid) t1 WHERE t.id = t1.bid
